snippet: The trial abruptly ended Saturday night after the girl’s testimony, and the juvenile court judge who is hearing the case said he would issue a verdict at 10 a.m. on Sunday.
abstract: Rape trial of Trent Mays and Ma'lik Richmond, two high school football stars in Steubenville, Ohio, ends after 16-year-old alleged victim gives testimony; juvenile court Judge Tom Lipps says he will issue verdict on March 17; case has drawn national attention for how it played out in text messages and social media.
lead_paragraph: The trial abruptly ended Saturday night after the girl’s testimony, and the juvenile court judge who is hearing the case said he would issue a verdict at 10 a.m. on Sunday.

headline.seo: Accuser Testifies at Steubenville Football Players’ Rape Trial
headline.main: Accuser Testifies in Ohio Rape Case; Verdict Expected
headline.print_headline: Accuser Testifies in Ohio Rape Case; Verdict Expected
